title: About Brain-rot Factory
subtitle: A vibe coding adventure
introduction: Welcome to the story behind Brain-rot Factory - a project born from an authentic collaboration between human creativity and AI assistance, where we discovered the true potential of coding together.

journey.title: Our Coding Adventure
journey.description: What started as a simple idea became an incredible journey of discovery. Rodrigo, a Brazilian developer, and GitHub Copilot embarked on a vibe coding adventure that pushed the boundaries of what's possible when humans and AI truly collaborate as partners.

collaboration.title: The Partnership
collaboration.description: This wasn't just about using AI as a tool - it was about creating a genuine partnership. Every feature, every design decision, every line of code was shaped through real-time dialogue, creative brainstorming, and mutual learning.
highlights: Real-time creative problem solving and architectural decisions
Continuous dialogue and iterative refinement of ideas
Shared ownership of creative solutions and technical challenges
Learning from each other's strengths and perspectives

development.title: Development Process
development.description: Every line of code, every design decision, and every feature was crafted through collaborative discussion and refinement.
features: Next.js 15 with App Router for modern web development
TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience
Tailwind CSS for responsive and beautiful UI

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe in the power of collaboration - not just between humans, but between humans and AI. This project demonstrates that the future of development lies in partnership, not replacement.

human.name: Rodrigo Gomes
human.description: Brazilian developer passionate about creating meaningful digital experiences. Brings years of expertise in full-stack development and a vision for innovative user interactions.

ai.name: GitHub Copilot
ai.description: AI assistant that helped shape every aspect of the project, from architecture decisions to implementation details, always learning and adapting to create the best possible outcome.

impact.title: Impact & Learning
impact.description: This project taught us valuable lessons about the future of software development and the potential of human-AI collaboration.
lessons: AI can enhance human creativity without replacing it
Collaborative development leads to better solutions
Real-time feedback accelerates the development process
The combination of human intuition and AI efficiency is powerful
Open source projects benefit from diverse perspectives

future.title: Looking Forward
future.description: Brain-rot Factory is just the beginning. We're excited to see how this project evolves and what new adventures await in the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.

acknowledgments.title: Acknowledgments
acknowledgments.description: Special thanks to the open source community, the creators of the amazing tools we used, and everyone who believes in the power of collaborative innovation.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This project is open source and available on GitHub. We encourage contributions, feedback, and forks. Let's build the future together!
